snippet.title: The Golf Club VR Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Golf Club VR officially steps out of early access into full release!

Get it here! : http://store.steampowered.com/app/489600/

The Golf Club VR is built off the foundation laid by HB Studios’ original award winning game released in 2014, The Golf Club, taking advantage of the original game’s stunning visual presentation and over 130,000, two kilometer² procedurally and user-generated courses. The Golf Club VR will allow you to enjoy your round of golf like never before on the Htc Vive and Oculus!

http://www.thegolfclubgame.com/
http://www.hb-studios.com

Check out the forums at: http://bit.ly/HB_Forums to keep up with the news and interact with us.

Come connect with us!
Facebook: http://bit.ly/Hb_Facebook
Twitter: http://bit.ly/GolfClub_Twitter
Twitch: http://bit.ly/HB_Twitch
